dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That 2-1 win for Slovenia over Kazakhstan in the Euro qualifiers, though... I mean, was that really down to luck, or were Kazakhstan just not clinical enough?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That two to one win for Slovenia over Kazakhstan in the Euro qualifiers, though... I mean, was that really down to luck, or were Kazakhstan just not clinical enough?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I think Ceferin himself admitted they were lucky! He said, uh, they thought they could lose until the very last moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I think Ceferin himself admitted they were lucky! He said, uh, they thought they could lose until the very last moment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: My country Slovenia played against Kazakhstan in the Euro qualifiers. I must say, until the very last moment we thought we could lose. We were skeptical. I think we were very lucky, said the UEFA president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah but come on, Tokayev was being diplomatic—calling Slovenia stronger. Do we really buy that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah but come on, Tokayev was being diplomatic-calling Slovenia stronger. Do we really buy that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Your team turned out to be stronger, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev remarked.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, football is unpredictable, you know? Even the UEFA president acknowledged Kazakhstan's strength afterward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, football is unpredictable, you know? Even the U E F A president acknowledged Kazakhstan's strength afterward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I know your team is very strong, the President of Kazakhstan added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's hard to ignore that it was a tense clash. Makes you wonder if the result would've been different on another day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's hard to ignore that it was a tense clash. Makes you wonder if the result would've been different on another day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and UEFA President Aleksander Ceferin recalled the tense clash between the national teams of Kazakhstan and Slovenia during the UEFA Euro 2024 qualifying, citing the Telegram channel "Bort No. 1."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure, and the fact that they met in Astana to discuss it shows how much that match stood out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure, and the fact that they met in Astana to discuss it shows how much that match stood out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, President Tokayev met with UEFA President, Aleksander Ceferin, in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But let's be real—Slovenia's got a decent team, but Kazakhstan isn't exactly a pushover either these days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But let's be real-Slovenia's got a decent team, but Kazakhstan isn't exactly a pushover either these days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And Tokayev pointing out their strength—it wasn't just politeness. They've been improving.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And Tokayev pointing out their strength-it wasn't just politeness. They've been improving.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I know your team is very strong, the President of Kazakhstan added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I guess, but I'm skeptical about calling it "luck." Maybe Slovenia just capitalized on their chances better.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I guess, but I'm skeptical about calling it luck. Maybe Slovenia just capitalized on their chances better.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or maybe, like Ceferin said, it was one of those games where anything could happen. That's football for you.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or maybe, like Ceferin said, it was one of those games where anything could happen. That's football for you.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yes, football is football, Aleksander Ceferin replied.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fair enough. Still, props to Kazakhstan for making it such a close match against a UEFA heavyweight like Slovenia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair enough. Still, props to Kazakhstan for making it such a close match against a U E F A heavyweight like Slovenia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and you know, that kind of performance probably earned them some respect on the European stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and you know, that kind of performance probably earned them some respect on the European stage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, true. Can't wait to see how they both fare in future qualifiers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, true. Can't wait to see how they both fare in future qualifiers.
